page.title: 17A DAY IN SCHOOL
page.content: A typical school day begins for me at about 7.30 when I get out of bed and have my breakfast of toast and cereal.After that I wash and dress.My twin sister and I leave for school about quarter to nine, my mum usually takes us in the car.I play with my friends for a short while then we go into school at 9.am We begin every morning by reading, this is when we have a chance to change our books. We spend each morning working on maths and English, sometimes we watch interesting T.V programmes.Lunch is from 12 until 1,I always stay for school dinners .Afterwards I play games with my friends, our afternoons are spent working on Nature, Scripture ,Craft and Environmental Studies.The school day ends at 3.30. When I get home I play skipping with my friends .After a small tea I go to about 9p.m.
